1.description: Returns to Rifthold as Aelin Galathynius, Queen of Terrasen, to rescue Dorian and reclaim her kingdom.

15.description: Reunites with Aedion and begins building her court and resistance against Erawan.

45.description: Leads the mission to rescue Dorian from the glass castle and confront her past.

1.description: Accompanies Aelin to Rifthold as her carranam and protector.

25.description: Supports Aelin's plans while maintaining his protective and strategic role.

5.description: Imprisoned by the King of Adarlan, awaiting execution for his suspected treason.

15.description: Rescued by Aelin and pledges his loyalty to his queen and cousin.

35.description: Forms part of Aelin's new court and helps plan the kingdom's restoration.

8.description: Shape-shifting courtesan who becomes an unlikely ally to Aelin despite their past enmity.

20.description: Reveals her shape-shifting abilities and pledges her loyalty to Aelin's cause.

45.description: Becomes a crucial member of Aelin's court and close friend.

1.description: Former Captain of the Guard, now struggling with his conflicted feelings about Aelin's return.

25.description: Gradually comes to terms with Aelin's true identity and joins her cause.

80.description: Injured in the final battle and begins his journey to the Southern Continent for healing.

25.description: Imprisoned and controlled by a Wyrdstone collar that suppresses his magic and free will.

70.description: Freed from the collar by Aelin and Chaol, regains his magic and personality.

85.description: Takes the throne of Adarlan after his father's death, becoming king.

5.description: Leading the Ironteeth witch army in service to the King of Adarlan.

35.description: Begins to question the orders and brutality expected of her by her grandmother.

75.description: Makes choices that put her at odds with her grandmother and clan expectations.

30.description: Still imprisoned in Morath, enduring terrible conditions and witnessing dark experiments.

55.description: Receives help from Kaltain and begins planning her escape from Morath.

75.description: Successfully escapes Morath with crucial information about Erawan's plans.

30.description: Transformed by Valg experiments into a weapon with shadow-fire abilities.

55.description: Retains enough humanity to help Elide and plan revenge against her captors.

75.description: Sacrifices herself to help Elide escape and destroys part of Morath in the process.

15.description: City guard captain who becomes involved with the resistance against Erawan.

45.description: Proves herself as a skilled archer and loyal ally in the fight against evil.

80.description: Accompanies Chaol to the Southern Continent to seek healing for his injuries.

12.description: Young girl rescued from the brothels by Lysandra, becomes like a daughter to her.

25.description: Lives under Lysandra's protection and care, receiving education and safety.

5.description: Manon's loyal wyvern mount, intelligent and protective of his rider.

35.description: Shows increasing intelligence and loyalty, often defying expectations.

5.description: Elite witch coven serving as aerial cavalry for Adarlan's forces.

45.description: Begin to question their orders as they witness increasing brutality.

25.description: Ancient Valg King who has possessed the King of Adarlan and plans to conquer the world.

50.description: Reveals more of his ancient power and plans for total domination.

85.description: His host body is killed, forcing him to seek a new form of existence.

25.description: Valg-possessed duke who oversees the dark experiments and military operations.

75.description: Killed by Kaltain's sacrifice when she destroys part of Morath.

5.description: Ruthless matron of the Blackbeak Clan, pushing Manon toward greater brutality.

75.description: Increasingly at odds with Manon over the direction of the clan and their actions.

40.description: Powerful Fae warrior in service to Queen Maeve, sent to find Aelin.

60.description: Begins to question his loyalty to Maeve as he learns more about the situation.

80.description: Helps Elide escape and begins to switch sides in the larger conflict.

35.description: Bronze door knocker with ancient wisdom, provides cryptic advice to those who seek the wyrdkeys.
Ancient queen's spirit who continues to guide and advise Aelin in her quest.

5.description: Manon's Second and most trusted member of the Thirteen.

45.description: Reveals more of her tragic past and why she's so loyal to Manon.

25.description: Young lord and member of the Terrasen resistance, initially suspicious of Aelin.

45.description: Gradually accepts Aelin as his rightful queen and joins her cause.

25.description: Elderly member of the Terrasen resistance, wise and experienced.

8.description: Brothel madam who exploited Lysandra and other young women.

15.description: Aelin's deceased love, remembered as she processes her past and current relationships.

8.description: Former master of assassins who trained Celaena, now an enemy to be dealt with.

25.description: Killed by Lysandra as part of Aelin's plan for revenge and justice.

30.description: Elide's treacherous uncle who betrayed his family to serve dark powers.
Elide's deceased mother, killed for her loyalty to Terrasen and Queen Evalin.

35.description: Ancient magical artifacts that can open portals between worlds and grant immense power.

70.description: Used to break Dorian's collar and later to banish Erawan from his host body.

25.description: Possessed by Erawan, no longer the man he once was but a vessel for ancient evil.

85.description: Killed during the final confrontation, freeing his soul and displacing Erawan.

40.description: Sends Lorcan to find Aelin, revealing her own agenda in the larger conflict.

5.description: Matron of the Yellowlegs Clan, rival and ally to the Blackbeaks in their service to Adarlan.
Matron of the Blueblood Clan, third member of the Ironteeth alliance.
Third in command of the Thirteen, strategic and reliable witch.
Fourth member of the Thirteen, aggressive and fierce in battle.
Fifth member of the Thirteen, quiet but deadly in combat.
Sixth member of the Thirteen, steady and dependable.
Seventh member of the Thirteen, skilled aerial combatant.
Eighth member of the Thirteen, fierce and loyal warrior.
Ninth member of the Thirteen, known for speed and agility.
Tenth member of the Thirteen, tactical and observant.
Eleventh member of the Thirteen, strong and dependable fighter.
Twelfth member of the Thirteen, youngest of the elite group.
Thirteenth member of the Thirteen, completing the elite coven.

35.description: Heir to the Blueblood Clan, rival to Manon but with a sense of honor.

60.description: Shows unexpected honor and fairness in dealing with Manon and the Thirteen.

35.description: Cruel and ambitious heir to the Yellowlegs Clan, Manon's enemy.

60.description: Continues to antagonize Manon and the Thirteen with increasing cruelty.

15.description: Various citizens and guards who secretly oppose the King's tyranny.

1.description: Elite guards protecting the glass castle and royal family.
Common citizens of Rifthold living under the King of Adarlan's rule.

35.description: High-ranking Valg demons commanding possessed forces in Rifthold.

30.description: Various captives held in Morath for experimentation and torture.

25.description: People throughout Terrasen who remained loyal to the Galathynius line.

15.description: Nobles from various kingdoms caught up in the larger conflict.

1.description: Captains of various vessels who transport people and goods between continents.
Business people trying to maintain commerce despite the ongoing conflicts.

5.description: Flying creatures bonded to the Ironteeth witches as war mounts.

35.description: Spirits of ancient rulers and heroes who offer guidance in the tomb.

15.description: Network of rebels working against the King of Adarlan from within Rifthold.

1.description: Merchants and traders conducting business in Rifthold's markets and districts.

25.description: Palace guards possessed by Valg demons serving Erawan's will.

5.description: Dealers in illegal goods operating in Rifthold's underground markets.

10.description: Members of the Assassin's Guild that once trained and housed Celaena.

20.description: Workers at Clarisse's establishment who provide information to Aelin.

15.description: Priestesses serving in the temples of Rifthold's various religious orders.

1.description: Guards responsible for maintaining order in Rifthold's streets and districts.
Workers who load and unload ships at Rifthold's busy port.
Sailors who crew the many ships coming and going from Rifthold's port.

55.description: Ironteeth witches stationed at Morath fortress serving Erawan.

35.description: Servants who work in the glass castle, many now under Valg influence.

1.description: Operators of taverns and inns throughout Rifthold where information flows freely.

5.description: Orphaned children living on Rifthold's streets, often used as spies and messengers.
Professional criminals who steal from citizens and visitors to Rifthold.
Individuals who secretly transport illegal goods in and out of Rifthold.

35.description: Nobles of the Adarlanian court, many now controlled or influenced by Valg forces.
Kitchen staff who prepare meals for the royal court and palace inhabitants.
Workers who care for horses and maintain the palace stables.
Guards responsible for maintaining and distributing weapons from the palace armory.
Court scribes who maintain records and handle correspondence for the crown.
Fast riders who carry messages between the palace and distant locations.

1.description: Skilled metalworkers who create weapons, tools, and household items.

10.description: Healers who treat injuries and illnesses throughout Rifthold.

15.description: Women who assist with childbirth throughout the city.

1.description: Skilled workers who create clothing and textiles for city residents.
Bakers who provide bread and pastries to Rifthold's population.
Meat sellers who provide protein to the city's inhabitants.
Sellers of fresh fish from the nearby waters and rivers.
Musicians, dancers, and entertainers who perform in the streets for coins.

10.description: Individuals who claim to predict the future for paying customers.
Skilled workers who create and bind books for the literate population.
Specialists who create medicines and potions from herbs and other ingredients.

1.description: Skilled artisans who craft jewelry and work with precious metals and gems.
Skilled workers who build and repair wooden structures throughout the city.
Craftsmen who work with stone to build and maintain city infrastructure.
Artisans who create glass objects, windows, and decorative items.
Craftsmen who work leather into armor, clothing, and useful items.
Merchants who import and sell wine and other alcoholic beverages.
Merchants who deal in exotic spices and rare seasonings from distant lands.
Traders who sell fabrics and textiles from various regions.
Specialized blacksmiths who forge weapons for guards, soldiers, and mercenaries.

5.description: Individuals who lend money at interest to those in need of funds.

1.description: Officials who collect taxes and fees for the royal treasury.
Workers who collect and dispose of human waste from city homes and buildings.
Workers who clean chimneys and flues to prevent fires in city buildings.
Workers who light and maintain street lamps throughout the city.
Workers who carry and deliver fresh water to homes and businesses.

25.description: Workers who dig graves and maintain cemeteries, busier than ever during dark times.
Families fleeing from war and Valg corruption seeking safety in Rifthold.

15.description: Citizens who secretly support the resistance against the King of Adarlan.

35.description: Musicians who perform for the royal court and palace functions.
Skilled dancers who perform at royal celebrations and court events.
Scholars who maintain the royal library and its vast collection of knowledge.
Workers who maintain the elaborate gardens and grounds of the glass castle.
Master tailors who create fine clothing for the royal family and court.
Master jewelers who craft precious items for the royal treasury and court.
Trained doctors who attend to the health of the royal family and court.

65.description: Specialists recruited to help with the destruction of the clock tower and other strategic targets.

10.description: Workers who maintain the underground sewers and waterways of Rifthold.

25.description: Workers who dig tunnels and underground passages for various purposes.

1.description: Guards who protect and monitor the bridges crossing Rifthold's rivers.
Guards stationed at the gates leading into and out of Rifthold.

25.description: Guards stationed in towers throughout the city for surveillance and defense.

5.description: Agile individuals who traverse the city by running across rooftops.
Warriors who fight in underground arenas for money and entertainment.
Individuals who run illegal gambling operations in hidden locations.
Dangerous individuals who lend money at extremely high interest rates.
Individuals who buy and sell stolen goods in the criminal underworld.
Individuals who collect and sell information and secrets for profit.
Skilled criminals who create false documents and identification papers.
Specialists who can open locked safes and secure containers.
Dangerous individuals who specialize in creating and administering poisons.

15.description: Leaders who coordinate spy networks and intelligence operations.
Specialists who can decode encrypted messages and secret communications.

25.description: Spies who work for multiple factions, playing different sides against each other.
Deep cover agents embedded in various organizations for intelligence gathering.

15.description: Fast runners who carry messages between resistance cells across the city.
Individuals who maintain secret safe houses for resistance members and fugitives.
Individuals who secretly transport weapons to resistance fighters.
Writers who create and distribute anti-royal propaganda and resistance materials.
Printers who secretly produce and distribute forbidden texts and resistance materials.
Wealthy individuals who secretly fund resistance operations against the crown.
Former nobles who lost favor with the crown and now support the resistance.
Ex-soldiers who deserted or were discharged and now fight against their former commanders.
Prisoners who escaped from royal dungeons and now work against the crown.

25.description: Families who lost loved ones in the King's wars and now oppose his rule.
People seeking sanctuary in temples from the growing violence and chaos.

35.description: Doctors who treat the mysterious diseases spreading through parts of the city.
Guards who enforce quarantine zones around areas affected by mysterious diseases.
Individuals who handle the increasing number of funerals and burials in the city.

65.description: Workers who maintain the great clock tower that becomes a target in Aelin's plans.

35.description: Architects who designed and know the secret passages of the glass castle.
Master masons who built and maintain the stone portions of the glass castle.

recaps.1: Aelin Galathynius returns to Rifthold disguised, ready to reclaim her throne and rescue her friends from the King of Adarlan's tyranny.
recaps.2: Aelin and Rowan survey the city and begin planning their assault on the glass castle while gathering intelligence.
recaps.3: The royal court continues under the iron grip of the possessed King while Dorian remains collared and controlled.
recaps.4: Aelin begins making contact with potential allies in the city while avoiding recognition by enemies.
recaps.5: Aedion awaits execution in the dungeons while Manon leads the witch armies in service to the King.
recaps.6: Political tensions rise as various factions position themselves for the coming conflict.
recaps.7: Aelin infiltrates deeper into Rifthold's underground while the Ironteeth witches maintain their aerial patrols.
recaps.8: Lysandra is introduced as an unexpected ally, despite her past enmity with Celaena.
recaps.9: The shape-shifter's true nature is revealed as alliances begin to form against the common enemy.
recaps.10: Plans develop for rescuing Aedion while gathering more allies for the resistance.
recaps.11: Evangeline's situation is revealed as Lysandra's motivation for joining Aelin's cause.
recaps.12: The network of allies expands as more people join the fight against tyranny.
recaps.13: Aelin begins putting her rescue plan into action while managing multiple objectives.
recaps.14: Coordination between the various resistance members improves as trust develops.
recaps.15: Aedion is dramatically rescued from his execution, reuniting with his cousin and queen. Nesryn joins the group.
recaps.16: The aftermath of the rescue creates new challenges as the group seeks safety.
recaps.17: Aelin and Aedion work through their relationship and plan the next phase of their campaign.
recaps.18: The resistance grows stronger as more allies commit to the cause.
recaps.19: Intelligence gathering reveals more about the enemy's plans and weaknesses.
recaps.20: Lysandra's abilities prove crucial as the group's capabilities expand.
recaps.21: Trust builds between former enemies as they work toward common goals.
recaps.22: The scope of Erawan's influence becomes clearer as the true enemy is revealed.
recaps.23: Plans are made to deal with both immediate threats and long-term objectives.
recaps.24: The group's unity strengthens despite the magnitude of their challenges.
recaps.25: Aelin encounters members of the Terrasen resistance, including Ren Allsbrook, and must prove her identity and worthiness. The possessed king's true nature becomes evident.
recaps.26: Negotiations with the resistance members test Aelin's patience and leadership skills.
recaps.27: Old grudges and new alliances complicate the political landscape of the resistance.
recaps.28: Aelin works to unite the various factions under her leadership as rightful queen.
recaps.29: The resistance network expands as more groups pledge their loyalty.
recaps.30: Elide suffers in Morath while Kaltain undergoes horrific transformations. The true scope of the enemy's power is revealed.
recaps.31: The dark experiments continue as the enemy's army grows stronger.
recaps.32: Prisoners in Morath face increasingly desperate circumstances.
recaps.33: The fortress of evil expands its operations as more victims are brought in.
recaps.34: Hope seems dim for those trapped in the enemy's stronghold.
recaps.35: Aelin seeks the Wyrdkeys in the ancient tomb, encountering spirits and ancient wisdom. Manon begins questioning her orders.
recaps.36: The tomb's secrets are revealed as ancient powers stir.
recaps.37: Mystical encounters provide guidance for the coming battles.
recaps.38: Ancient knowledge proves crucial for understanding current threats.
recaps.39: The connection between past and present becomes clear.
recaps.40: Lorcan is introduced as he searches for Aelin on Maeve's orders, adding another layer to the conflict.
recaps.41: The Fae warrior's mission brings new complications to an already complex situation.
recaps.42: Multiple agendas create additional tension as various powers maneuver.
recaps.43: The search intensifies as different factions pursue their goals.
recaps.44: Conflicting loyalties create new challenges for all parties involved.
recaps.45: Aelin assembles her court and prepares for the assault on the glass castle. Manon's internal conflict deepens.
recaps.46: Final preparations are made as the assault team readies for battle.
recaps.47: The various plot lines begin converging as the climax approaches.
recaps.48: All parties move into position for the decisive confrontation.
recaps.49: The stage is set for the final battle against tyranny.
recaps.50: Last-minute preparations and emotional moments before the assault begins.
recaps.51: The team infiltrates the castle as the rescue mission commences.
recaps.52: Stealth gives way to action as the assault intensifies.
recaps.53: Multiple objectives must be achieved simultaneously during the chaos.
recaps.54: The rescue operation faces unexpected obstacles and resistance.
recaps.55: Kaltain aids Elide's escape plan while preparing her own revenge. The prisoners make desperate moves.
recaps.56: Escape attempts begin as hope returns to the desperate captives.
recaps.57: The fortress's security is tested as prisoners fight for freedom.
recaps.58: Courage emerges in the darkest places as people resist their oppressors.
recaps.59: Sacrifice and heroism shine through in the face of overwhelming evil.
recaps.60: Lorcan encounters Elide and begins questioning his loyalty to Maeve.
recaps.61: Unexpected alliances form as circumstances force enemies to work together.
recaps.62: The Fae warrior's mission becomes complicated by personal feelings.
recaps.63: Loyalties are tested as the larger conflict affects everyone.
recaps.64: New partnerships emerge from the chaos of shifting allegiances.
recaps.65: The assault on the glass castle reaches its critical phase as the team fights to reach Dorian.
recaps.66: The rescue mission faces its greatest challenges as the enemy responds.
recaps.67: Battles rage throughout the castle as multiple objectives are pursued.
recaps.68: The confrontation with ultimate evil begins as heroes face their greatest test.
recaps.69: Ancient powers clash as good and evil meet in decisive battle.
recaps.70: Dorian is freed from the collar through the combined efforts of his friends and the Wyrdkeys' power.
recaps.71: The prince's liberation changes the balance of power in the conflict.
recaps.72: Freedom brings new possibilities as former prisoners join the fight.
recaps.73: The tide of battle begins to turn as heroes gain crucial advantages.
recaps.74: Victory seems possible as the enemy's control starts to slip.
recaps.75: Kaltain sacrifices herself to destroy part of Morath and enable Elide's escape, dealing a significant blow to the enemy.
recaps.76: Heroic sacrifice inspires others to greater acts of courage.
recaps.77: The enemy suffers significant losses as their fortress is damaged.
recaps.78: Hope spreads as word of successful resistance reaches others.
recaps.79: The balance of power shifts as the dark forces face serious setbacks.
recaps.80: The final confrontation in the glass castle reaches its climax as Erawan is banished from his host body. Chaol is severely injured.
recaps.81: The aftermath of battle leaves heroes wounded but victorious.
recaps.82: The immediate threat is ended but new challenges emerge.
recaps.83: Recovery and assessment follow the intense battle.
recaps.84: The cost of victory becomes clear as heroes deal with losses.
recaps.85: Dorian takes the throne of Adarlan as king, while Chaol and Nesryn prepare to journey to the Southern Continent.
recaps.86: New leadership brings hope for healing and reconciliation.
recaps.87: Arrangements are made for recovery and future cooperation.
recaps.88: The book concludes with new alliances formed and hope restored, though greater challenges still lie ahead for the continent.
